title: Management Information Base for Intermediate System to Intermediate System (IS-IS)
abstract:
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)
for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.
Specifically, this document describes a MIB for the Intermediate
System to Intermediate System (IS-IS) Routing protocol when it is used
to construct routing tables for IP networks.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
